posts.post_title: F/S T-206 Leach Port. & Kroh (Lionel Carter Collection)
posts.post_content: I have F/S a T-206 Tommy Leach Port. graded GAI VG 3 for $55.00 shipped. And a T-206 Rube Kroh (Lionel Carter Collection) graded SGC 50 for $65.00 shipped. Thanks for looking!  [url]mpowers23@verizon.net[/url]    :)
